text: Heartbroken on the Moselle () is a 1953 German romantic comedy movie directed by Kurt Hoffmann and was based on the 1932 novel by Rudolf G. Binding. It stars Will Quadflieg, Elisabeth MÃ¼ller, Oliver Grimm, Renate Mannhardt and John Van Dreelen. == Other websites == * Category:1953 romantic comedy movies Category:German romance movies Category:German comedy movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Kurt Hoffmann
